context: Analyze this seated pose and identify comprehensive transition relationships. Staff Pose (Dandasana) Seated with legs straight, spine upright. Consider the Core strength, spinal alignment, leg engagement. Analyze transitions that flow naturally from this pose and evaluate both immediate possibilities and progressive developments. Factor in modifications for different ability levels and the pose's role in creating balanced sequences.

practitioner.position: Seated with legs straight, spine upright
practitioner.primaryFocus: Core strength, spinal alignment, leg engagement

specificNeeds: Core strength, spinal alignment, leg engagement
